item.title: 562 Adding Shops
item.dc:creator: @iloob iloob
item.description:
@iloob wrote:

Before you do any editing make a backup of your java files just incase nothing works.
Go to yoursevername -> src -> com -> rs2hd -> content
Open up ShopHandler.java and shops.java
Now in ShopHandler.java search public void openshop
You see under that some like this

case 1: p.getActionSender().sendString("General Store", 620, 22);//shops name shopopen(p, 1);//shop link //generalStore = true; items = GameEngine.shops.Generalshoplumb;//shops item id list itemsN = GameEngine.shops.GeneralshoplumbN;//shop item amount p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 64209, 93, p.getInventory().getContainer()); p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 63746, 556,items, itemsN); break;
so under the break copy and paste this

case 7: p.getActionSender().sendString("Skillcape Store", 620, 22);//shops name shopopen(p, 7);//shop link //generalStore = true; items = GameEngine.shops.Skillcape;//shops item id list itemsN = GameEngine.shops.SkillcapeN;//shop item amount p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 64209, 93, p.getInventory().getContainer()); p.getActionSender().sendItems( -1, 63746, 556,items, itemsN); break;
After pasting that go back up to public void openshop
And above that you will see something like this

[code=java]case 1:
switch (buttonId2) {//general shop
case 0:return 303;
case 1:return 305;
case 2:return 301;
case 3:return 311;

            }
            break;[/code]

under the break copy and paste this

case 7: switch (buttonId2) {//skillcape shop case 0:return 9748; case 1:return 9751; case 2:return 9754; case 3:return 9757; case 4:return 9760; case 5:return 9763; case 6:return 9766; case 7:return 9769; case 8:return 9772; case 9:return 9775; case 10:return 9778; case 11:return 9781; case 12:return 9784; case 13:return 9787; case 14:return 9790; case 15:return 9793; case 16:return 9796; case 17:return 9799; case 18:return 9802; case 19:return 9805; case 20:return 9808; case 21:return 9811; case 22:return 9813; case 23:return 12170; case 24:return 9949; } break;
after pasting that save your ShopHandler.java file and close it. Now go to your shop.java file or open it up if don’t already have it up.
You should see something like this

public int[] Generalshoplumb = {9748, 9751, 9754, 9757, 9760, 9763, 9766, 9769, 9772, 9775, 9778, 9781, 9784, 9787, 9790, 9793, 9796, 9799, 9802, 9805, 9808, 9811, 9813, 9949, 12170}; public int[] GeneralshoplumbN = {100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100}; and under that paste this

public int[] Skillcape = {9748, 9751, 9754, 9757, 9760, 9763, 9766, 9769, 9772, 9775, 9778, 9781, 9784, 9787, 9790, 9793, 9796, 9799, 9802, 9805, 9808, 9811, 9813, 9949, 12170};//item id public int[] SkillcapeN = {100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100, 100};//item amount
now save and close that file
now go to yoursevername -> src -> com -> rs2hd -> packetHandler
open up SummonPacketHandler.java and search GameEngine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 1);
you will see something like this

case 588: GameEngine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 1); break;
and under the break paste this

case 519://npc trade click (Bob) GameEngine.shopHandler.openshop(p, 7); break;
now save and close that file and go to yoursevername -> data
in your data folder open up npcs.xml file with notepad and on the first line you should see this

<list>

right under that paste this

<npc><id>519</id><location><x>3029</x><y>3353</y><z>0</z></location></npc>

now save that file and close it and compiler your content and packetHandler folder.
Rune your server and client and tele to 3029 3353 and trade with bob and that should be all.

Read full topic
